game.title: Survivors: The Lost City
game.synopsis: In Survivors: The Lost City, players embark on a journey to find the legendary Lost City in a post-apocalyptic world. They navigate treacherous landscapes, scavenge for resources, and confront fierce enemies while seeking humanity's survival.
game.beginning: After the catastrophic event, you discover yourselves in a barren wasteland. With meagre supplies, you set out on a perilous quest to reach the Lost City and uncover its secrets.
game.ending: After overcoming countless trials and battling the mutated faction guarding the city, your group emerges victorious or falls under their control. The outcome determines the fate of humanity and leaves an indelible mark in this dystopian world's history.
